mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GATHERING(GATHERING_NUM, GATHERING_TITLE, GATHERING_CONTENT, GATHERING_CATEGORY, GATHERING_LOCATION, GATHERING_MAX_CNT, GATHERING_MAX_AGE, GATHERING_MAX_SEX, GATHERING_TYPE, GATHERING_HASHTAG, GATHERING_RATING, GATHERING_PHOTO, GATHERING_GALLERY) VALUES(#{gathering_num, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gathering_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathering_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathering_category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathering_location, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathering_max_cnt, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gathering_max_age, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gathering_max_sex, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathering_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathering_hashtag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gathering_rating, jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{gathering_photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{gathering_gallery, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
